Company: Ahold USA, parent company of Stop & Shop, Giant stores and Tops stores via  subcontractor Electronic Data Systems (EDS)
Description of incident: An EDS employee lost a              laptop computer during a commercial flight that contained pension              data of former employees of Ahold's supermarket chains including Social              Security numbers, birth dates and benefit amounts.  The laptop was lost form the checked baggage of a domestic commercial airline flight on May 2, 2006.  The laptop was not recovered even though the incident was reported immediately.
